tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Mr. Goodbar is a nice teacher but it\'s very unclear what he expects at times. His lectures are very long and very boring. Lost interest in the class first few days. His test are very hard and labs are not so bad. You have to attend class if you want to pass. If given a redo of the class I would drop it and taken someone else.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Bio 21 can be very tough if you don\'t put in the effort and come to class (especially for labs you can\'t make them up). He is an easy grader on labs as long as you complete them. Tests are multiple choice with a written page that is fully based on lecture notes so you must come to class to get the notes! The book is mainly used for pictures!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: One of the best teachers at COS. Very passionate, supportive, and enthusiastic. I enjoyed taking his class. He is willing to help you throughout the semester. As long as you put some effort, you should be able to pass his course without any problems. Do not expect an easy A though. His lectures are interesting, but be prepared to study a lot.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: He is an amazing teacher and he knows what he is talking about. His labs are fun and challeging. Also the class is easy to pass as long as you take notes, he lets you know what will be on the test.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: You must attend class in order to do well in this class. He is great at letting you know what will be on the test. it is a hard class and you will need to study for his quizzes and tests. The final is not too bad. He is a great teacher who is very structured. He uses blackboard allot.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I LOVED Mr. Goodbar. He was a fabulous teacher and really knows this subject well. I attended class every single day and attended the lab as well. I completed every assignment, nothing late. Because of that, he held high expectations of me. So be prepared for the high expectations if you\'re a good student!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: DO NOT miss any classes. I missed 1 class which cost me 2 assignments. I couldn\'t recover those points, and they would\'ve made the difference between an A and the B at the end.This is not a class that you can just get by in. Take good notes, and study. He was a great teacher, very clear and organized. Its just a lot of info delivered quickly.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I looked forward to Mr. Goodbar\'s class. It was so interesting, lectures were very detailed, labs were challenging but fun. Exams & lab quizzes are tough but fair, don\'t expect an easy A. Mr. Goodbar knows his stuff & is very enthusiastic about teaching. He cares & is willing to help anyone needing help. I\'d take him again in a heartbeat :)

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Mr. Goodbar made Animal Biology very easy to understand. First lab, then lecture. Lab was always intersting and very hands on. Lections were done off of slide show...very informative, a little boring at times. As long as you write down every slide and memorize it, you will do fine on the quizzes and tests. Overall great teacher that knows his stuff

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Good teacher. You have to go to class though. I did very well in his course, but there was some studying to do. Not a lot of homework.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I\'ve taken him for bio 20, 21, and 22. He is great at explaining things that you know nothing about in a way you can understand. You use the texts for pictures that\'s about it. pretty simple exams if you study your notes, even easier lab tests if you download the study guide or powerpoint. Works with students well, and a fun field trip at the end.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I took this course as an optional class, because it is transferable to my desired college. Out of 52 completed units, I have (had...) an accumulated 3.56 GPA and a 4.0 for my major. Point being, I know how to study, and work very hard to get A\'s. Although Goodbar tries to help you through his course, he is just too difficult. Be careful...

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: He was a fair teacher. The lectures go all the way to the end of class, so not at all let out "early." Always answered questions in a way we could understand. He is also a pretty entertaining teacher at time.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I\'ve had Goodbar for Intro to Bio & Plant Bio. I love the level of difficulty in his class. He is clear & organized and if you are thorough in your note taking and actually study you can do really well in his classes. I\'ve studied off of all my lecture notes and got A\'s in both classes. I\'m really looking forward to his Bio2 class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: took him over the summer and he\'s great and fun. The lecture is a great help on tests. They are exactly the same just a lot of information to help people remember thats all. Over all he\'s a great professor.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: This class was hard for me....thats all i remember of it the exams were hard thats true...

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Class was very interesting. He\'s very helpful. Will repeat lecture over and over until you get it. Tests are semi hard. If your a plant nerd like i am you\'ll have it easy.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Goodbar is an excellent teacher. You will only have to crack the text book maybe a couple of times. As long as you go to lecture and take notes and do the homework you\'ll be fine
